column3: Faculty of Business, Law and Tourism
column5: This challenging Masters degree will demonstrate to future employers that you have the skills and knowledge to take on senior Human Resources management positions.You will study a range of HR topics, such as leadership, talent management and managing organisational change. When you successfully complete the course you will have fulfilled part of the requirements for professional membership of the Chartered Institute of Personnel Development (CIPD).
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
